sentences.english: Among hardiest of cherimoya, does well in most present growing areas.
sentences.chinese: 耐寒其中荔枝，做得好，目前大部分主產區。

sentences.english: Many cold- tolerant plants can be harmed by frost.
sentences.chinese: 許多耐寒植物會受到霜凍的侵害。

sentences.english: Objective To study effects and regulatory mechanism of zinc on cold stress in rats.
sentences.chinese: 目的研究補鋅對大鼠耐寒力的影響及其可能機制。

sentences.english: Hardy annuals are capable of handling frost and some freezing, and still survive.
sentences.chinese: 耐寒植物能夠抵抗霜凍和一定程度的冰凍並存活下來。

sentences.english: Their flower production slows down, but then the truly hardy winter-flowering pansies come into their own.
sentences.chinese: 但這時候真正耐寒的冬花三色堇就開始一花獨放了。

sentences.english: Hardy mosses sometimes pioneer on uncolonized rock surfaces.
sentences.chinese: 耐寒的苔蘚常能在尚未生長植物的岩石表面首先生長。

sentences.english: It is also used as quakeproof material and products requiring excellent low temperature property.
sentences.chinese: 還可以用於各種耐寒性要求高的製品和用作防震材料。

sentences.english: According to customers requirment, our product coincidence EN-71, ASTM-963 and also can be in high heat and cold.
sentences.chinese: 等標準，並根據客戶要求做到高耐熱及耐寒要求。

sentences.english: But Mike Lizotte says a hardy bulb can stay in the ground all year.
sentences.chinese: 但利佐特稱，耐寒鱗莖植物可以全年種在地裏。

sentences.english: The cold resistance is an important property of soft polyvinyl chloride(PVC).
sentences.chinese: 耐寒性是軟質聚氯乙烯的重要性能指標之一。

sentences.english: It must be a cold-resistant plant.
sentences.chinese: 看來還是一種耐寒的植物。

sentences.english: High virus, hardy heat-resistant strong, suitable for greenhouse trellis cultivation.
sentences.chinese: 高抗病毒病，耐寒耐熱性強，適宜溫室大棚栽培。

sentences.english: These are the seedlings that are hardening off in a hotbed.
sentences.chinese: 這些是放在溫牀中經受耐寒鍛鍊的幼苗。

sentences.english: It is much hardier than lemon, however, though less hardy than grapefruit and sour orange.
sentences.chinese: 它雖不及葡萄柚和酸橙耐寒，但卻比檸檬耐寒得多。

sentences.english: It is much hardier than lemon, however, though less hardy than grapefruit and sour orange.
sentences.chinese: 它雖不及葡萄柚和酸橙耐寒，但卻比檸檬耐寒得多。
